long_description: The light and compact Joby Gorillapod Original tripod doesn't monkey around when it comes to getting great shots. It wraps around nearly anything and grips onto nearly any surface. Unlike traditional tripods, Gorillapod doesn't require an elevated flat surface for you to take the perfect shot. Flexible joints help Gorillapod bend and rotate 360deg to form the perfect shape. Ring and foot grips provide extra gripping power to most surfaces. Slim-line attachment stays connected to your camera; lock ring keeps your camera securely attached. Joby Gorillapod Original tripod supports a compact camera weighing up to 11.5 oz.
short_description: The light and compact Joby Gorillapod Original tripod doesn't monkey around when it comes to getting great shots. It wraps around nearly anything and grips onto nearly any surface.
